channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:46 Air anxiety in the Sumy Oblast follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 09:46 Air anxiety in the Sumy Oblast follow further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 09:13 Flashing anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchanskaya Territorial Community

Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchanskaya Territorial Community#Kharkiv.
